description: Defines enums for chess piece sides and types, a data class for chess pieces, and an extension function to represent pieces as Unicode chess characters.

classes.name: Side
classes.description: Enumeration for the two sides in chess: WHITE and BLACK.

classes.name: PieceType
classes.description: Enumeration for the types of chess pieces: King (K), Queen (Q), Rook (R), Bishop (B), Knight (N), Pawn (P).

classes.name: Piece
classes.description: Data class representing a chess piece with side and type properties.

methods.name: Piece.toUnicode
methods.description: Extension function that converts a Piece instance into its corresponding Unicode chess character.
